definition: to associate/to think of
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: The calm when the blue-black couplet letting a person like ink remembers copy calligraphy and unruffled .
sentences.chinese: 墨水般的深蓝色让人联想起临摹书法时的平静和安详。

sentences.english: The seashore remind me many hapiness of my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 海滨使我联想起童年假期的各种愉快情景。

sentences.english: Darker purples can conjure gloominess and sadness.
sentences.chinese: 暗紫色使人联想起忧郁和悲伤。

sentences.english: The seashore reminds me many joyful scenes of my vacation in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 海滨使我联想起童年假期的各种愉快情景。

sentences.english: These pictures are reminiscent of my late father.
sentences.chinese: 这些照片使我联想起我的亡父。

sentences.english: Which brings me to the case of the collapsing crisis commission.
sentences.chinese: 这让我联想起了正在分崩离析的危机委员会。

sentences.english: This mishap reminded me of a traffic accident I once experienced.
sentences.chinese: 这次不幸事故使我联想起我过去经历的一次交通事故。

sentences.english: Controlled the air conditioning button which on the stage arranged in turn to let me associate the candied fruit.
sentences.chinese: 中控台上依次排列的空调按钮让我联想起了糖葫芦。

sentences.english: She reminds me of a Barbie doll.
sentences.chinese: 她让我联想起芭比娃娃。

sentences.english: Locust trees in the north, is a reminiscent of the autumn decoration.
sentences.chinese: 北国的槐树，也是一种能使人联想起秋来的点缀。

sentences.english: One usually associates poverty with misery.
sentences.chinese: 人们一说到贫穷，常常就联想起悲惨的境遇。

definition: to recall/to think of/to call to mind
to associate (cognitively)/to make an associative connection/mental association/word prediction and auto-complete functions of input method editing programs
abbr. for 聯想集團|联想集团[Lian2 xiang3 Ji2 tuan2]
to let one's imagination roam
shiver all over though not cold/tremble with fear/shudder
can't help (doing sth)/can't refrain from
one's thoughts fly to a longed-for place or person/to long for/infatuated/fascinated
déjà vu (the experience of seeing exactly the same situation a second time)/seemingly familiar/apparently already acquainted
can't help/cannot but
to have one's hair stand on end (idiom)/to feel one's blood run cold
inevitably
to be overwhelmed by emotions
passing thought/an idea that comes into one's head/recollection
cannot help laughing/unable to restrain a smile
lit. not to know whether to laugh or cry (idiom)/between laughter and tears
to feel deep veneration for sb (idiom)
lit. slap the table and shout with praise (idiom); fig. wonderful!/amazing!/great!
